page.title: 21Council Services
page.content:
The Borough of Crewe and Nantwich was abolished on 1st April 2009, when Cheshire East unitary authority was formed.

The boroughs of Crewe and Nantwich, Congleton and Macclesfield were amalgamated with a disaggregated share of the former Cheshire County Council.

Nantwich now has a two-tier local government - Cheshire East at the unitary level and Nantwich Town Council at local level.
